game.name: Barbarization
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Barbarization is a roguelite dungeon crawler with elements of bullet hell and RPG. Loot weapons, rare items, and special ability cards to build a unique character each run. Face enemy hordes and challenging bosses to claim new territories and expand your civilization.
